wpt.name: GC2BBAA
wpt.desc: Blown Circuit by spoyd & spoydette, Traditional Cache (1.5/1)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Blown Circuit
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: A micro hidden in a shopping area. I wonder where it could be? Don't lift the skirt - that is the domain of the little stingers.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
What can I say. I was here with spoydette replacing one cache and placing another. I had this micro container in the bag and all ready to go. Why not make it a hat trick and place a third. Don't let the fact that there are a number of typical locations for a hide like this stop you from looking.
The name refers to the former tenants of the nearby retail location and their ultimate demise. (I sense a series coming on)
You should be able to drive right up next to this hide. There shouldn't be any trouble with muggles - at least for now. Don't forget to re-hide as found - we don't want to make it too easy.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Don't bother searching the plant life - it ain't there.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Found on a cold night with dawnie22 and our girls.
